data.title: Top 10 Oscar-Winning British Films
meta_keywords: The Bridge on the River Kwai
data.meta_description: A list of the top 10 best British films to have won an Academy Award for Best Picture
data.text:
: Jesse Polowin

Written by JJ Heaton

The Academy Awards may be an American event, but we Brits have a habit of sneaking our way to the top of their ranks. Welcome to WatchMojo UK, and today we'll be counting down our picks for the Top 10 Oscar-Winning British Films.

For this list, we'll be taking a look at the best of the best: British films that have taken home the Academy Award for Best Picture. We are only including films that were produced or co-produced by film companies based in the UK, so movies with a British cast or theme which were funded elsewhere, such as “Shakespeare in Love” or “Braveheart”, do not count. For this list, it's what's behind the camera that matters, not in front of it.

Special thanks to our user RichardFB for submitting the idea on our interactive suggestion tool: WatchMojo.comsuggest
